welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sheerness, a charming coastal town in the UK known for its beautiful beaches and rich maritime history. We invite you to explore and enjoy this quaint town during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Southend Airport is used for overflow and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport is a modern and compact facility, offering a convenient and efficient travel experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.
